alert.note: Alert for Mason; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 8:23PM CDT until April 22 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MASON AND SOUTHWESTERN SAN SABA COUNTIES... At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grit, moving southeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR MASON AND STREETER. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. This severe storm will be near... Mason around 830 PM CDT. Art around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Highway 29 And Ranch Road 1222, Koockville and Erna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
